com.fluidops.fedx.algebra
Class CheckStatementPattern

java.lang.Object
  com.fluidops.fedx.algebra.CheckStatementPattern
All Implemented Interfaces:
QueryRef, StatementTupleExpr, java.lang.Cloneable, org.openrdf.query.algebra.QueryModelNode, org.openrdf.query.algebra.TupleExpr
public class CheckStatementPattern
extends java.lang.Object
implements StatementTupleExpr

A statement pattern with no free variables when provided with some particular BindingSet in evaluate. For evaluation a boolean ASK query is performed. Wraps a StatementTupleExpr

Author:
Andreas Schwarte
